data.text:
@davidhall75 I believe Shane is the radio version of #ClickBait except that he wants you to pay 30cent for your every comment on what ever his opinionism is. Newstalk seem to prefer controversial views for its revenue stream

He also seems to be one of the only msm journalists not on Twitter
@davidhall75 He stated he welcomed the return of George Hook. Newstalk has become the right wing voice of Ireland.
@davidhall75 Shane Coleman is an ill informed pack hound.
@davidhall75 easy on the oxygen , msm and radio #DenisOBrien are pushing their narrative
@davidhall75 @GTCost @BreakfastNT By enabling Williams on a daily basis Coleman has zero credibility in my book
@davidhall75 Shane Coleman on his Newstalk show said Conor Skehan didn't say homelessness was normal https://t.co/4Bwjt1RtBz he did on RTE MI https://t.co/VXlBvhRQDZ
